name: The Simulation
description:
This is a first person, physics simulation based puzzle game. Gain unique powers along the way, and solve puzzle using these powers in creative ways. At certain checkpoints, player must answer riddles and questions which test your intelligence and morality. The beta version contains around 10-20 hours of gameplay, depending on how quickly you solve each puzzle.

You will use different abilities such as telekinesis, magnetism, time slowdown, time reversal, scale change, and portal creation to solve puzzles. These powers affect in-game objects in different meaningful ways and enable the player to progress through the level.

Controller Support Coming soon!
